Package Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Model.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
This is Player class. Create player bar and implement operations of player bar.
Since:
24 November 2021
Version:
0.2
Author:
Chin Hong Shen

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.awt.Point ballPoint, int width, int height, java.awt.Rectangle container)
      This is Player class constructor. Initialize variables.
      Parameters:
      ballPoint - represents the location of the ball
      width - represents the width of player bar
      height - represents the height of player bar
      container - represents the area of the frame

  • Method Details

    • makeRectangle

      private java.awt.Rectangle makeRectangle​(int width, int height)
      This method is used to create rectangular player bar.
      Parameters:
      width - represents the width of player bar
      height - represents the heigth of player bar.
      Returns:
      return (x,y) coordinate space, width and height to form rectangle shape

    • impact

      public boolean impact​(Ball b)
      This method is used to determine whether the ball has contact with the player bar.
      Parameters:
      b - represents ball class.
      Returns:
      return true if the ball has contact with player bar

    • move

      public void move()
      This method is used to determine the movement of player bar.

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo​(java.awt.Point p)
      This method is used to set the player bar to center position in the beginning of the game.
      Parameters:
      p - represents the start point of the player bar.

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      This method is used to set the move amount of the player bar. Move player bar to the left.

    • moveRight

      public void moveRight()
      This method is used to set the move amount of the player bar. Move player bar to the right.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      This method represents the move amount when the player bar stopped. The move amount is 0 when there is no movement.

    • getPlayerFace

      public java.awt.Shape getPlayerFace()
      This method is used to get playerFace variable which is the player bar.
      Returns:
      outline of the player bar's shape

    • getMoveAmount

      public int getMoveAmount()
      This method is used to move amount.
      Returns:
      move amount

    • setMoveAmount

      public void setMoveAmount​(int moveAmount)
      This method is used to set move amount.
      Parameters:
      moveAmount - represents move amount
